Name: 			Cheril the Goddess

Submitted By: 	na_th_an

Category:		1 (the contest)

Description:  	Cheril must obtain the Skull of Podewwwr and use its power to
				become a goddess. In order to do so, she must open three gates
				and unlock a magic column.

				The gates are magically locked by the temples of Stone, Paper 
				and Scissors. You must break the seals using the proper 
				medallion in each temple, which you have to find.

				The magic column is unlocked using a key in the keyhole located
				next to the column.

				Cheril can get three magic charges from the pedestals with two
				hearts engraved. He can use such charges to gain super powers
				for a short while (being able to fly around and becoming invin-
				cible) or to activate teleporters which will take her to the
				center of the map.

				You can open the gates and the magic column in any order. You
				can also take a look at a map telling you where everything is
				located. You can only carry one object at a time.

Controls:		D-pad: Movement
				Select: Continue (title screen) / Map (ingame)
				Start: Starts the game from the beginning (title screen) / Pause
				B: Interact / use / action, etc.
				A: Jump
				B + UP: Activate super powers.

Rom info:		Mapper 2, UNROM 64K with vertical mirroring
				Filesize 64K
				Special peripherals Needed: none

Credits:		na_th_an - Design, Code, Levels & Graphics
				Davidian - Music & SFX
				Anjuel - Ines
				Shiru - Neslib & Famitone2

Other:			When you continue you lose the item you are carrying, but other
				than that, progress is saved.

				If you get lost, take a look at the map. The map is updated as
				you progress.
				
http://nesdevcompo.nintendoage.com/files/2016/Category1/Cheril_the_Goddess.zip


_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Licencia
A continuación os indicamos a qué tenéis que ateneros al usar MK2 o cualquiera de nuestros engines (salvo MK1/La Churrera – Para la licencia de este producto consultar su página http://www.mojontwins.com/juegos_mojonos/la-churrera/) o códigos fuentes, o al utilizar gráficos, ideas, argumentos, personajes, músicas, sonidos, ilustraciones, etc… es decir: TODA NUESTRA OBRA CREATIVA. Gracias a nuestro amigo Marco Fernández por la traducción al inglés.

Todo el contenido de la web, toda nuestra obra creativa, incluido el código fuente está bajo licencia Creative Commons 3.0 “by-nc-ca”, o sea, “Reconocimiento-NoComercial-CompartirIgual 3.0 Unported (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0)”

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/deed.es_ES

Esto significa que eres libre de:

– Copiar, distribuir y comunicar públicamente la obra.
– Transformar la obra.
– Crear productos derivados de la obra.

Bajo las siguientes condiciones:

Reconocimiento — Debes reconocer los créditos de la obra de la manera especificada por los Mojon Twins (pero no de una manera que sugiera que tiene su apoyo o apoyan el uso que hace de su obra). En este caso, sólo te pedimos que incluyas el texto “Powered by La Churrera” o “Powered by MK2” (según aplique) o incluyas el logo que incluimos en el archivo logo.png en la pantalla de carga y la portada del güego.

No comercial — No puede utilizar esta obra para fines comerciales.

Compartir bajo la misma licencia — Si altera o transforma esta obra, o genera una obra derivada, sólo puede distribuir la obra generada bajo una licencia idéntica a ésta.

Entendiendo que:

Renuncia — Alguna de estas condiciones puede no aplicarse si se obtiene el permiso explícito de los Mojon Twins.

Aviso — Al reutilizar o distribuir la obra, tiene que dejar bien claro los términos de la licencia de esta obra.

En resumen

– Los güegos que hagan deben lanzarse bajo una licencia CC equivalente. Si quieres lanzar los güegos bajo otro tipo de licencia, debes hablar con nosotros y pedir permiso. Esto incluye especialmente la elaboración de copias físicas (ver más abajo).

– Debes incluir “Powered by la Churrera” o “Powered by MK2” o “Powered by NOMBRE-DEL-ENGINE” según aplique, o el logo correspondiente en pantalla de carga y portada. No te cuesta ningún trabajo y nos beneficiamos todos.

Sobre las copias físicas

– Copias físicas privadas: Puedes grabar un juego en una cinta, cd, dvd, disquete o cartucho para tu disfrute propio.
– Copias físicas promocionales: Puedes grabar un juego en una cinta, cd, dvd, disquete o cartucho y regalarlo a tus amigos corriendo tú personalmente con todos los gastos.
– Copias físicas para vender (incluye recompensas en crowdfundings y cualquier otra actividad que implique un intercambio económico): Depende del producto pero, en cualquier caso, lo mejor es preguntar.
License

You must observe the terms below when using MK2 or any of our engines or source code (save for MK1/la Churrera; read more at http://www.mojontwins.com/juegos_mojonos/la-churrera-english/ ), or when using our graphics, ideas, storylines, characters, music, sounds, illustrations, etc., i.e. ANY OF OUR CREATIVE WORK

All the content on this site, and all of our creative work, including source code, are licensed under Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0.)

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/

This means you can freely:

– Copy, distribute and transmit our work.
– Transform our work.
– Create products derived from our work.

You may do so under the following terms:

Attribution — You must attribute the work in the manner specified by the Mojón Twins (but not in any way that suggests that they endorse you or your use of the work.) In this case, we only ask that you include the text “Powered by La Churrera” or “Powered by MK2” (as applicable) or that you include the logo included in the file logo.png in the game’s loading screen and cover art.

NonCommercial — You may not use this material for commercial purposes.

Share Alike — If you alter or transform this work, or generate any work derived from it, you can only distribute your derived work under a license identical to this one.

Understanding that:

Disclaimer — Some of these conditions may not be applicable if you obtain explicit permission from the Mojón Twins.

Notice — When reusing or distributing the work, you need to clearly specify the terms in its license.

In a nutshell

– The games you make must be released under an equivalent CC license. If you want to release your games under a different kind of license, you must contact us to get permission. This applies specially to the manufacturing of physical copies (see below.)

– You must include “Powered by la Churrera” or “Powered by MK2” or “Powered by ENGINE-NAME” as applicable, or the corresponding logo on the loading screen and cover art. This is easy for you, and will benefit all of us.

About physical copies

– Private physical copies: You may record a game on tape, CD, DVD, floppy disk or cartridge for your own personal use.
– Promotional physical copies: You may record a game on tape, CD, DVD, floppy disk or cartridge to give away to your friends paying for all expenses yourself.
– Physical copies for sale (including crowdfunding rewards and any activity involving economic transactions): It depends on the product, but in any case, the best practice is always give us a shout and ask.
